attributes.action: not allow the Red Arrows at the 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We see no reason to use an occasion for bringing people together as an excuse for a military display, unnecessary air and noise polution and increasing the chance of death and injury by human or mechanical failure.  The money for such an air display would be better spent trying to minimise the crime (muggings, murders, rape and robbery) that spectators are undoubtedly likely to suffer by visiting London in 2012 (or indeed at any time) by providing properly trained tourist police.

rejection.details: The organising committee of London 2012 will decide what to include in the Opening Ceremony and other celebrations.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
